channel.title: Google Speech Api on Alex Pliutau
channel.description: Recent content in Google Speech Api on Alex Pliutau

item.title: Games based on Voice Recognition
item.description: Hi, folks! Last Saturday I was very inspired by Alexa skills using server-side Swift talk organized by Wizeline Vietnam team. Speakers made a demo of how can we use Alex Skill in League of Legends (LoL). This Skill enables a user to retrieve the statistics of the enemy team mid-match using voice-enabled commands. I went home with an idea of building a game, fully based on voice recognition, without any interface.
